title: Documentary Photography and Activism with Daniella Zalcman
description: In this week's episode, Daniella Zalcman catches us up to speed on the ethical and responsible practices of documentary photography. We discuss how rage motivates her work, why she started Women Photograph, and what jobs pay documentary photographers well.
dc:creator: How You Create
